This torrent does work properly, I have managed to get the game up and running with no problems. Mount the iso normally (or extract the .sid's to a desired directory), once mounted launch the setup and you will be prompted for the first .sid's files. Search(...) for the directory you extracted them or just open the virtual Dvd drive b/c this is where they are located. Ok, the installation should be done by now. In the Virtual-Drive there is a Razor 1911 folder, the contents of this folder are to be copied and replaced with the contents located in the directory were you installed the game (files in the folders, Bin, Gamedata, Movies, Sound). Ex. the contents in the Razor 1991 bin file are to be copied over to the bin file in the game directory. 

Once all the files are copied/replaced... go to the Bin file in the games directory and run the game, everything should work fine from here. 

Enjoy and Good Luck

- Mini window will pop up and ask you to choose language. Choose language and close it.
- When the installation is done.
Start (SmartSteam) then to start the game go to Star - All programs - Supreme Commander 2 - And press on (Play.exe)

You are done now. and can play Online with others.

Don't have to unrar - I think it's a redundant step in the instruction.

Just mount the ISO with Daemon Tool or VirtualCloneDrive and install.

Then copy the contents under Razor1911 folder from mounted drive to installed folder and overwrite existing files.

Unmount ISO file and play game.
